definition[0]: if information, a computer program etc uploads, or if you upload it, you move it from a small computer to a computer network so that other people can see it or use it
example[0]: It might take a while for this to upload.
definition[1]: information, computer programs etc that have been uploaded, or the process of uploading them
definition[2]: to move information or programs from your computer onto another computer, especially onto a larger central computer
example[2]: If you are uploading and downloading big files you need a quicker modem.
